name: duff
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
bad, not useful, or not working: He's directed so many movies that you might expect a few duff ones.

US informal a person's bottom: Get off your duff and start working. up the duff
UK informal pregnant: Two days before I was due to have an appointment with the doctor, I found out I was up the duff.
